'''Nincada''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''ツチニン''' ''Tutinin'') is a dual-type {{2t|Bug|Ground}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation III]].

It [[Evolution|evolve]]s into {{p|Ninjask}} starting at [[level]] 20. Additionally, if the {{player}} has a spare slot in the [[party]] and an extra {{DL|Poké Ball|Poké Ball}}, a {{p|Shedinja}} will appear in the player's party when Nincada evolves. An extra [[Poké Ball]] is not necessary to obtain Shedinja in Generation III.

==Biology==
Nincada is a small, whitish, insectoid Pokémon. It has a pointed snout, a thin stripe that dips in a V-shaped pattern between its eyes, and two whisker-like antennae on its face. Its eyes are black with green iris-like rings inside. As it is virtually blind, it uses its antennae to sense its surroundings. On its back is a pair of small, green wings. Its hind legs are white, but the forelegs are brown and have sharp claws. The claws are used to carve the roots of tree and absorb moisture and nutrients. Nincada builds underground nests at the {{DL|List of Pokémon by habitat|Forest Pokémon|roots of trees.}} It does not like sunlight, so it avoids it.

==In the anime==
[[File:Kellyn Nincada.png|220px|thumb|left|Nincada in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
Nincada debuted in ''[[AG027|A Three Team Scheme]]''. It belonged to a boy named [[Keanu]], who lived in his [[Secret Base]] in solitude.

===Minor appearances===
A Nincada appeared in ''[[DP071|Pokémon Ranger and the Kidnapped Riolu! Part One]]'', where [[Kellyn]] used his [[Capture Styler]] on it and had it {{m|Dig}} a pit trap for [[J's henchmen]] to fall in.
{{-}}

A Nincada belonging to {{tc|Aqua Admin}} [[Shelly]] appeared in ''[[PS246|Can I Ninjask You a Question?]]'', where it was given to fellow admin [[Aqua Admin Amber|Amber]]. Amber's new Pokémon soon evolved into {{p|Ninjask}}, leaving behind a {{p|Shedinja}}, as well.

==Trivia==
* Nincada is the only Pokémon that evolves into [[List of Pokémon with branched evolutions|two Pokémon at once]].
* Nincada is the only Pokémon with a [[List of Pokémon by base stats|base stat total]] of 266.
* Nincada is the only Pokémon to have a higher base stat total than its evolution, as it has 30 more base stat points than Shedinja.

===Origin===
{{Bulbanews|On the Origin of Species: Nincada, Ninjask and Shedinja}}
It appears to be based on a cicada nymph.

====Name origin====
Nincada is a combination of ''{{wp|ninja}}'' and ''{{wp|cicada}}''.

Tutinin is a combination of 土に埋める ''tsuchiniumeru'' (to bury in the ground) and ''ninja''.
